reference.shortdesc: Preformatted text is text that contains line breaks and spaces that are intended to be preserved at publication time.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Processors SHOULD preserve line the breaks and spaces that are present in the content of a pre element.
Processors SHOULD preserve line the breaks and spaces that are present in preformatted text.
